title: Miami-Fort Lauderdale-West Palm Beach metro area population U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: In general Number of residents has rose over the Year.
Number of residents is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Number of residents, about 6086935.0 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Number of residents, of value 5583547.0 was reported at Year 2010
